name: Now or Never (Myllenium Mylene)
description:
In this mini game  developed in a week by two game design students, the character that you embody have 1 minute to make realize to the inhabitants of this planet that the end of the world is coming. Use your protest attack in order to wake them up.

Controls
Move = left / right arrows
Interact = E
1 minute to go

Credits

Mylene Ben Osman
